short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your background with a beautiful sunset scene

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your workspace with Custom Sunset Background. This extension allows you to customize your background with a stunning sunset scene, where the golden-orange light of the setting sun blends with the sky and clouds, creating a serene and warm atmosphere.
